## Why?

::: {.sectionhead .absolute top="0" left="90%"}
1 [2 3]{style="opacity:0.25"}
:::

<br>
<br>

::: {.incremental}

To know the potential of Integrated Livestock-Crop-Forestry (ICLF) systems in Brazil

: Reduce national greenhouse gases liquid emissions?

: Increase overall productivity?

: Improve farm revenue?

: Lead agriculture towards sustainability?

:::

## How?

::: {.sectionhead .absolute top="0" left="90%"}
[1]{style="opacity:0.25"} 2 [3]{style="opacity:0.25"}
:::

<br>
[<br>]{.mbr}
[<br>]{.mbr}

::: {.incremental}

1. Identify ICLF systems characteristics and dynamics in Brazil

2. Estimate the potential of ICLF systems to provide benefits, in the context of climate change

3. Evaluate the implementation of ICLF as a mean to curb and mitigate climate change, in relation to different perspectives of solutions

:::

## What?

::: {.sectionhead .absolute top="0" left="90%"}
[1 2]{style="opacity:0.25"} 3
:::

<br>
<br>

- A database with data from ICLF experiments

- A model for quantifying benefits provided by ICLF systems

- Data set with future projections regarding the expansion of ICLF

- Qualitative assessment of the ICLF as public policy
